attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many animals are raised in factory farms for meat and dairy products, in unnacceptable conditions. Animals are treated in humanely, some have never seen daylight, and are used like machines. They are continuously impregnated, particularly cows, to keep milk flowing. Piglets have tails ripped off, and other painful things are inflicted on these helpless, innocent animals, all without pain killers.
They are kept in cramped conditions, often living in their own waste. 

Most of these animals are not shocked properly, before enduring a slow and painful end to their suffering life. 

We must make this cruelty a thing of the past, we must but a stop to this cruelty happening in our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
